titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, March 1, 1949

mods.note: Reverend Walter Burgess (?) Konawa Seminole Missionary Baptist Church
mods.tableOfContents: A few church songs, preaching in Creek-Seminole.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
